scene_description_enriched: A female figure, identified as Saint Mary Magdalene by her attribute, kneels with her hands clasped over her abdomen. She wears a blue tunic and a red cloak, and a golden halo encircles her head. In her right hand, she holds a golden vessel, possibly an ointment jar. The background depicts a stylized green landscape with hints of architectural structures in the distance, suggesting an outdoor setting. The scene is likely a devotional representation of Saint Mary Magdalene, emphasizing her penitence and devotion.
